Activity: Start the day with a quick check of my personal social media to get energized. Then, log into the company system and review emails.
Review all past activities from the week, and look into today's plan.
Revisit the draft suitability assessment questionnaire. Incorporate research findings and best practices gathered on Wednesday.
Focus on structuring the questionnaire in a logical and user-friendly manner. Group similar questions together and use clear headings.
Consider the different ways UHNWIs might prefer to answer the questionnaire (e.g., online, paper-based, interview). Ensure the questionnaire is adaptable to different formats.
Lunch time! Grab lunch with @mkt-1 (Marketing & Communications Specialist). Chat about our weekend and any fun events coming up. It's good to get away from the desk and recharge.
Continue working on the format, and structure of the suitability questionnaire based on the UHNWI.
Take a break! Browse some online fashion stores for new inspiration.
Back to work. Review the refined suitability questionnaire, and think from the perspective of multiple individuals. What concerns would they have?
Summarize the progress on the suitability assessment questionnaire. Review and make notes for tomorrow's final touches.
